text: Dangshi, nimen shuo:“Mu sa a! Women jue buneng renshou [zhi chi] yi zhong shiwu, qing ni wei women qiu ni de zhu [an la] ba! Qiu ta wei women shengchan chu da dishang suo shengzhang de zuowu——shucai, huanggua, dasuan, biandou he cong.” Ta [an la] shuo:“Nandao nimen yao yong gaoji de huanqu diji de ma? Nimen xia dao yizuo chengshi qu ba! Nimen [zai nali] jiang hui huode nimen suo qiqiu de.” Zhihou, tamen chang zao xiuru he qiongkun, chang zao an la de qian nu, zhe shi yinwei tamen bu xinyang an la de jixiang, wangtu shahai xianzhimen; zhe shi yinwei tamen weikang he chaoyue fadu.
